price: Kuma ku yi ɗã'a ga Allah da ManzonSa, kuma kada ku yi jãyayya har ku raunana kuma iskarku ta tafi, kuma ku yi haƙuri. Lalle ne Allah Yanã tãre da mãsu haƙuri.
arabic: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَلَا تَنَٰزَعُواْ فَتَفۡشَلُواْ وَتَذۡهَبَ رِيحُكُمۡۖ وَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṭīʿū al-laha warasūlahu walā tanāzaʿū fatafshalū watadhhaba rīḥukum wa-iṣ'birū inna al-laha maʿa al-ṣābirīna
